CustomField.formula: if(isblank(SmartViscaf__bk_image_id__c) || isblank(SmartViscaf__bk_width__c) || isblank(SmartViscaf__bk_height__c) , null , hyperlink( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=" & SmartViscaf__bk_image_id__c , image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=" & SmartViscaf__bk_image_id__c , "サムネイル(裏面)" , SmartViscaf__bk_height__c / 4 , SmartViscaf__bk_width__c / 4) , "_blank" ) )
CustomField.label: サムネイル（裏面）
